languages.text: "Изображать саму невинность не выйдет. Губернатор Вьятт, на вас пало подозрение в ереси — вам дана одна попытка опровергнуть обвинение".
"Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."
languages.original_text: "Изображать саму невинность не выйдет. Губернатор Вьятт, на вас пало подозрение в ереси — вам дана одна попытка опровергнуть обвинение".

traits.locale_text: "Acting the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."
"Acting the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."
"Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."
"Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."
"Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."
"Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

languages.text: “故作无辜恐怕是行不通的，维亚特总督。有人怀疑你犯下了异端恶行，你只有一次机会来反驳这种指控。”
languages.original_text: "Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

traits.locale_text: “故作无辜恐怕是行不通的，维亚特总督。有人怀疑你犯下了异端恶行，你只有一次机会来反驳这种指控。”

languages.text: «No le servirá de nada hacerse la inocente. Gobernadora Vyatt, se han establecido sospechas de herejía contra usted: cuenta con una única oportunidad de refutarlas».
languages.original_text: "Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

traits.locale_text: «No le servirá de nada hacerse la inocente. Gobernadora Vyatt, se han establecido sospechas de herejía contra usted: cuenta con una única oportunidad de refutarlas».

languages.text: « Inutile de jouer la victime innocente. Gouverneure Vyatt, on a porté à ma connaissance des suspicions d'hérésie à votre encontre. Je vous offre là votre unique opportunité pour les réfuter. »
languages.original_text: "Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de jouer la victime innocente. Gouverneure Vyatt, on a porté à ma connaissance des suspicions d'hérésie à votre encontre. Je vous offre là votre unique opportunité pour les réfuter. »

languages.text: 「無垢な被害者を装っても通用しないぞ。ビャット総督、お前には異端の疑いがかけられている。反論できる機会はただ一度だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

traits.locale_text: 「無垢な被害者を装っても通用しないぞ。ビャット総督、お前には異端の疑いがかけられている。反論できる機会はただ一度だけだ」

languages.text: "Masum rolün bana işlemez. Size karşı kâfirlik suçu şüphesi kaydedildi Vali Vyatt. Bu şüpheyi ortadan kaldırmak için tek şansınız var."
languages.original_text: "Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

traits.locale_text: "Masum rolün bana işlemez. Size karşı kâfirlik suçu süphesi kaydedildi, Vali Vyatt. Bu şüpheyi ortadan kaldırmak için tek şansınız var."

languages.text: "Das unschuldige Opfer zu spielen, wird nicht funktionieren. Gouverneurin Vyatt, gegen Euch wurde der Verdacht der Ketzerei geäußert – Ihr habt genau eine Gelegenheit, ihn zu widerlegen."
languages.original_text: "Playing the innocent victim will not work. Governor Vyatt, suspicions of heresy have been raised against you — you have exactly one opportunity to refute them."

traits.locale_text: "Das unschuldige Opfer zu spielen, wird nicht funktionieren. Gouverneurin Vyatt, gegen Euch wurde der Verdacht der Ketzerei geäußert – Ihr habt genau eine Gelegenheit, ihn zu widerlegen."
